hero.title: We deliver perfect technology
hero.description: Solving customer challenges with innovative release agents.

footer.address: 14 Soi Krungthep Kreetha 31, Thap Chang, Saphan Sung, Bangkok 10250

section1.title: Suitability For An Item That Needs Secondary Processing
items: Pelicoat F (For film or thin-walling molding processing)
section1.features: This paintable release agent has vegetable oil as the main ingredient. It has superb release performance and is appropriate for secondary processing. Any residual agent on the product can be easily washed off with petroleum or alcohol-based general-purpose cleaners.

section2.title: Partly Suitable – Fluorine-based release agents
section2.features: This release agent contains a fluorine compound as the main ingredient. It forms a uniform film on the mold surface, provides superb release performance, and prevents the mold from becoming dirty. The agent can also be applied as a mold protecting agent. *(The agent can be used for secondary processing (painting) only after it is applied and heated (at least 150°C).)*

section3.title: Not Suitable – Silicone-based release agents
section3.features: This release agent contains silicone oil as the main ingredient. It provides high heat resistance and release performance. Depending on the molding conditions, high or low viscosity can be chosen.

section4.title: Special Purposes – Anti-memory & Less-sticky
section4.features: This anti-memory and less-sticky release agent contains fatty acid soap as the main ingredient. The agent is appropriate for thermoplastic resins in general as well as transparent resins.

section5.title: Special Purposes – Stress-crack Resistant
section5.features: This release agent that contains modified silicone oil as the main ingredient offers outstanding release performance and minimizes stress-cracks. This general-purpose agent is resistant to heat and static and is appropriate for transparent resins and engineering plastics.

section6.title: Automatic Release Agent Sprayer
section6.note: Mount this Pelicoat cans onto the Autoben. The system makes it easier to spray and set the spraying time and quantity. The device applies the agent appropriately and equally according to the number of shots specified.

recommendations.Vegetable Oil-Based: Perfect for secondary processing like painting — easy to clean!
recommendations.Fluorine-Based: Partially suitable — requires heating (≥150°C) before painting
recommendations.Silicone-Based: Not suitable for painting — silicone adheres too strongly
recommendations.Fatty Acid Soap: Reduces memory marks & stickiness — great for clear resins!
recommendations.Modified Silicone: Prevents stress cracks — ideal for engineering plastics
recommendations.Autoben AS983: Automated spraying with precise control — saves time & waste!
